title: Eldritch Blast
content:
ion: Conjure a beam of crackling energy. Level: Cantrip School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No

How to Acquire Eldritch Blast in BG 3

Eldritch Blast can be acquired by the following: Warlock Spell Sniper (Feat) Magic Initiate: Warlock (Feat)

Warlock Spell Sniper (Feat) Magic Initiate: Warlock (Feat)

Eldritch Blast Tips & Notes for BG 3
